</plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Provides the ability to detect whether planned changes conflict with other changes or have other scheduling issues</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:Detect-Change-Conflicts</help> <id>com.snc.change.collision</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Change Management - Collision Detector</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.change.collision/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.maintenance_schedules</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.change.collision</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
